bug.author: kylegao91
bug.summary: Length of iterator fails in Python 2
bug.description: The division len(dataset) / batch_size will be cast to int in python2, so that math.ceil doesn't really work when len(dataset) is not a multiple of batch size.

comments.comment: Yeah, this is a bug. The solution should be to wrap batch_size in float. Will fix.
I think it's preferable to just from __future__ import division?
Yes, thanks. I'm not very conversant in the Py2 world...
